revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Symbol |model=AP-4131 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/25/2001 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=H9PLA4131M |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=non-standard |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC855;XPC855TZP50D3; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF080-90-4C-EI |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC1M16A1S |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module=Symbol LA-4131 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-BNC,MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Level One |eth_chip2_model=LXT971LC |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=101 |default_ssid_regex=^101$ |default_ip=10.1.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=Symbol |oui=00:A0:F8 |oui_eth=00:A0:F8 }} [http://nag.ru/projects/inside/34602/ Internal shots]
There is no reset button on the device.
The [http://www.guardit.cn/UploadFiles/symbol_ap4131_engmanual.pdf manual] says the default IP address is '''10.1.1.1'''.
The power adapter included with the unit is a '''Symbol''' 50-24000-021 (12V, 1A).
==Images== <gallery> File:Symbol AP-4131-1050-WW board top card in.jpg|board top, card in File:Symbol AP-4131-1050-WW board top.jpg|board top File:Symbol AP-4131-1050-WW board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
